biotools.summary:
An extra-fast and accurate adapter- and quality-trimmer for sequencing data.
There is a bug in multi-file handling in v1.2.0 and previous versions of Ktrim, therefore the author strongly recommend all users update to version 1.2.1 (or later versions).

bioschemas.name: Ktrim
bioschemas.summary:
An extra-fast and accurate adapter- and quality-trimmer for sequencing data.
There is a bug in multi-file handling in v1.2.0 and previous versions of Ktrim, therefore the author strongly recommend all users update to version 1.2.1 (or later versions).
